Lewis Stein

untitled, 1978, 66”x216”x7’ (168x540x18 cm), 300 watt bulbs ceramic sockets electric ware relay, timer

The 2 lights are timed on a 4 second cycle. Right light is on for 2 seconds while other light is off. Then left light goes on for 2 seconds while right light is off etc.
